text:
ASI Steel Sustainability Awards 2025 - Winners and High
Commendations
Project Awards featuring the use of steel in infrastructure or building projects for exemplary
sustainable outcomes:
WINNER LARGE PROJECTS (>$10 million) – St Marys Integrated Project Office
Entering Organisation: Robert Bird Group
Architect: Place Studio
Engineer: Robert Bird Group
Head Contractor: Built
Steel Fabricator: Proline Steel
WINNER SMALL PROJECTS (<$10 million) – Bradbury Park Playscape
Entering Organisation: BridgeFab
Architect: Alcorn Middleton
Engineer: Bligh Tanner
Head Contractor: Epoca Constructions
Steel Fabricator: BridgeFab
HIGHLY COMMENDED SMALL PROJECTS (<$10 million) – Queensland Rail Bridge Refurbishment
Entering Organisation: Sun Engineering
Architect: Queensland Rail
Engineer: Queensland Rail
Coatings: Fero Coatings
Steel Fabricator: Sun Engineering
Company achievement awards featuring exemplary company sustainability achievement:
SMALL BUSINESSES (<100 FTE)
Jointly won by:
Structural Challenge and BridgeFab
The People Award for Leadership in Steel Sustainability Innovation:
Justin Mendiolea
